alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Preston; Western Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 25 at 6:06PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL TUCKER AND SOUTHERN PRESTON COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM EST... At 605 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking heavy showers along a line extending from near Terra Alta to near Newburg. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kingwood, Terra Alta, Rowlesburg, Newburg, Tunnelton, Hannahsville, Silver Lake, Elgon, Aurora, Fellowsville, Israel, and Cathedral State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Preston; Western Tucker
